en.start.user:
Hello, %{username}\.

❓ To use the bot, make sure you have lastfm account and press /connect

❗ If you don't have one, press /nolastfm for useful info

❤ Find detailed bot info at /help
en.start.hacker:
%{username},
you have %{qty} accounts saved: %{accs_noalarm}\.
To add and delete accounts, use /connect and /disconnect\.

Find detailed bot info at /help
en.disconn_lfm_conversation.choose_acc: Choose lastfm's profile name to disconnect:
en.disconn_lfm_conversation.acc_not_found: Bot had waited for account name to disconnect, but _%{acc}_ was not found\. Try /disconnect again
en.disconn_lfm_conversation.error_when_del: Error while deleting _%{acc}_\. We'll investigate this
en.conn_lfm_conversation.max_acc_reached: ❗ Sorry, maximum %{qty} accounts possible at the moment\. Use /disconnect to remove accounts
en.conn_lfm_conversation.some_error: ❗ Sorry, somehow bot can't add your account
en.conn_lfm_conversation.alarm_info:
Bot will notify you each day at %{time} UTC if there will be new events\.
Press /getgigs to check events anytime you want
en.delete_user_conversation.choose: ✂ If you want to delete all the information about your user profile, including scrobbles, sent events and settings, press *Yes*
en.delete_user_conversation.error: ❕ Error happened while deleting you data\. Probably operation was not done\. We'll check that soon
en.delete_user_conversation.answer_not_foun: ❕ What does it mean? Anyway, operation canceled
en.news_builders.403:
Oops\! We get error *403*: it seems _%{acc}_'s tracks are private\.
Change your Last\.fm user settings to use this bot
en.news_builders.404: Ops\! We get error *404*: it seems _%{acc}_ is not a correct Last\.fm username
en.news_builders.90: Ups\! We get error *90*: it is some HTTP error\. We'll check that soon
en.news_builders.some_error: Oups\! We get error *%{err}* when load tracks from Last\.fm for %{acc}\. We'll check that soon
en.nolastfm.message:
If you don't have *lastfm account*, just [register](https://www.last.fm/join/) one\.
It is free and great service since 2002
⬇
Add your *music service* like iTunes, Spotify, YouTube, etc\. to your new account in [settings](https://www.last.fm/settings/applications) of lastfm website
⬇
Press /connect\. Enter *lastfm account* name and forget about the bot
✅
Bot will send you notification, when it find new concerts among listened artists\.
Notes:
• Bot works only with *public accounts* at this moment
• You can add accounts of your frinds or family members — and, may be, go to event together?
en.test.test: It *is* the test _%{arg1}_ very %{arg2}* hard'n pass ❎
